switchPlans.question: Can I switch plans later?
switchPlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

freeTrial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to get started.

exceedLimit.question: What if I exceed my student or storage limit?
exceedLimit.answer: If you exceed your limits, we'll notify you and give you options to upgrade your plan or manage your resources accordingly.

billing.question: Is billing monthly or yearly?
billing.answer: We offer both monthly and yearly billing options. Yearly plans come with a significant discount compared to monthly billing.

customized.question: What's included in the Customized plan?
customized.answer: The Customized plan includes unlimited students, priority support, custom branding, advanced analytics, and dedicated account management.
